name: Thread checkmarks
author: shazbot
label: Checkmark on subbed mags
desc:
Append a checkmark to magazines on the thread index you are subscribed to.

Depending on the amount of subscriptions, it might take a long time for all checkmarks to appear. If "Caching" is enabled, results will be saved and reused the next time, providing instant results. But to reset the cache, you'll have to turn this mod off and on again.
